channel.title: BETA TESTERS NEEDED ( not for a server )
channel.description:
hey im coming up to the end of my social networking website i need a few beta testers to check everything is in order.
skill's required
[code]
an understanding of how to function a website knolidge of php and java script [/code]
If you want to beta test for me please PM me
i need 3 beta testers thanks!

item.title: BETA TESTERS NEEDED ( not for a server )
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“Facinus, post:11, topic:305158”][quote author=NewScape09 link=topic=401416.msg2974948#msg2974948 date=1254213705]
skill’s required


an understanding of how to function a website
knolidge of php and java script

[/quote]

i m very understanding of function a website as well as very knolidgble of php and java script. i also hav run numers of social networkin sites including my space and face book, i wud be happy to beta test for u and giv u my profeshunal opinion[/quote]

lol at troll

item.title: BETA TESTERS NEEDED ( not for a server )
item.dc:creator: @Starting_up Starting up ...
item.description:
@Starting_up wrote:

[quote=“NewScape09, post:1, topic:305158”]hey im coming up to the end of my social networking website i need a few beta testers to check everything is in order.

skill’s required


an understanding of how to function a website
knolidge of php and java script

If you want to beta test for me please PM me

i need 3 beta testers thanks![/quote][quote=“NewScape09, post:3, topic:305158”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=401416.msg2974949#msg2974949 date=1254214086]
not to be a downer, but I can’t be bothered to register at one of the numerous social networks out now. Why would anyone want to use another? Does it have something new and exciting that hasn’t been seen before?
[/quote]

im in amongst trieing to create a video chat like skype has?

trieng haha my brother is helping me so im sure it will be done.

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 29, 2009, 03:21:26 am[/size][hr]to add on that , what dont social networking sites have that i could possibly add?[/quote]Won’t get far not being able to spell basic words. I’m really hoping that English isn’t your first language.

Read full topic
item.source: BETA TESTERS NEEDED ( not for a server )

item.title: BETA TESTERS NEEDED ( not for a server )
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

NewScape09:

what dont social networking sites have that i could possibly add?

That’s the tricky bit.

I don’t believe for a second that someone who can barely speak/put effort into their posts is any good at any programming language. Your brother will probably turn out to be a developer for hotscripts.com, and this will be yet another failed attempt at gaining recognition.

Read full topic
